input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Magefesa 01BXVITRE10 Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set

Item keywords:
Extremely easy to cleanup
Oven safe up to 600F
Dishwasher safe
Limited Lifetime Warranty
input_text.Response A:
Attention:
Don't waste time scrubbing pans! Our Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set cleans up in a snap.

Interest:
Our stainless steel pans are oven safe up to 600F, so you can cook in the oven and the pan will hold up.

Desire:
Our Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set is perfect for any kitchen. With a limited lifetime warranty, you can rest assured knowing that these pans will last.

Action:
Buy our Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set today and you'll never have to scrub a pan again.
input_text.Response B: Attention: We are Magefesa 01BXVITRE10 Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set, and we are the perfect cookware set for your kitchen. With our extremely easy cleanup, dishwasher safe, and oven safe up to 600F features, we will make your cooking experience a breeze. Our limited lifetime warranty will give you peace of mind, so you can focus on what really matters: cooking and enjoying your food. Interest: We are made of stainless steel, so you can trust us to last long and provide even heat distribution. Our durable construction will make us a long-lasting addition to your kitchen. Desire: We want you to have the best possible cooking experience, so we have included a tempered glass lid and a steam vent to make sure that your food is always cooked to perfection. Action: Don't wait any longer to upgrade your kitchen with our Magefesa 01BXVITRE10 Vitreux Stainless Steel 10-Piece Cookware Set. With its amazing features and limited lifetime warranty, you can't go wrong. Order now and start cooking like a pro.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B is better composed, and follows the prompt better than response A.
